page.syntax: Context.Security.AddUserToRoles as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the role was added; otherwise .F.

argument.name: RoleNames as C
argument.description: The names of the roles to which the user will be added. Role names are separated by crlf.

page.description: Adds a user to the supplied roles
page.discussion: Context.Security.AddUserToRoles() adds a user to the supplied roles. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@../Security/index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
